name: The Reality Heist
description:
A mixed reality experience for HTC VIVE!

Join your friends in the ultimate mixed reality heist: to break into the bank each of you will need to work in sync! One of you will be the eyes, one the hands and one the ears of the team. Keep your cool, solve the riddles... and don't get caught! And remember... Communication is the key!

If you are more the loner type, you can also play the game by yourself... But we won't guarantee as much enjoyment as if playing with your friends!
